column2: etc. - be aware of awareness
column3: how it impacts autistic people" "Wed Oct 19 16:04:01 +0000 2016" True

column1: kpagination ".@slooterman autistic people communicate and express feelings differently
column2: that's OK" "Wed Oct 19 16:02:53 +0000 2016" True

column1: kpagination ".@slooterman: recognize sensory barriers - ERs are incredibly stressful and loud and bright" "Wed Oct 19 16:01:27 +0000 2016" True
kpagination ".@slooterman talking about Kayden Clarke now (more on Kayden Clarke: https://t.co/oZq4SsKCkY)" "Wed Oct 19 16:00:47 +0000 2016" True
kpagination ".@slooterman - it's also about knowing that many autistic people are not there for the autism itself" "Wed Oct 19 15:59:25 +0000 2016" True
kpagination ".@slooterman autism competency - not just knowing the clinical features of autism
column2: not just being able to read signs" "Wed Oct 19 15:58:54 +0000 2016" True

column1: kpagination ".@slooterman opportunity for LEND programs to provide leadership." "Wed Oct 19 15:58:27 +0000 2016" True
kpagination ".@slooterman more text-based ways to communicate needed" "Wed Oct 19 15:58:03 +0000 2016" True
kpagination ".@slooterman: need more autism competency in mh care
column2: more mh competency w. autism professionals" "Wed Oct 19 15:57:18 +0000 2016" True

column1: kpagination ".@slooterman: some professionals may not treat ppl who are "" too complicated""" "Wed Oct 19 15:56:10 +0000 2016" True
kpagination ".@slooterman @kpagination mh care professionals + behavioral therapists often" "Wed Oct 19 15:55:58 +0000 2016" True
kpagination ".@slooterman many autistics have had trauma w medical professionals in general" "Wed Oct 19 15:55:25 +0000 2016" True
kpagination ".@slooterman many barriers to care - phone calls
column2: money
column3: previous negative interactions w mh professionals
column4: lack of autism competency" "Wed Oct 19 15:53:00 +0000 2016" True
